title: What the interns have wrought, 2017 edition
description: Intern season is coming to a close, and it’s a nice time to look back (as I’ve done in previous years) and review some of what the interns did while they were here. The dev intern program has grown considerably, with almost 40 dev interns between our NY, London, and Hong Kong offices.
